alert.note: Alert for Carlton; Lake; Pine; St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 18 at 4:29PM CDT until May 18 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN PINE...SOUTHEASTERN ST. LOUIS...EASTERN CARLTON... SOUTHWESTERN LAKE...NORTHWESTERN BAYFIELD AND DOUGLAS COUNTIES... At 429 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Highland Lake, to near French River, to near Holyoke, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Highland Lake, French River, Stoney Point, Knife River, Castle Danger, Split Rock Lighthouse, Port Wing, Hawthorne, Solon Springs, Herbster and Lake Nebagamon. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
